text: (tatha kahegaah) he jinnon tatha manushyon ke (mushrik) samudaay! kya tumhaare paas tumheen mein se rasool nahin aaye,[1] jo tumhen hamaaree aayaten sunaate aur tumhen tumhaare is din (ke aane) se saavadhaan karate? ve kahengeh ham svayan apane hee virudhd gavaah hain. unhen saansaarik jeevan ne dhokhe mein rakha tha aur apane hee virudhd gavaah ho gaye ki vaastav mein vahee kaafir the
